column4: with the alternate/server cd's recovery mode, what would "reinstalling grub" do?
reinstall grub ?? ;) i guess it set ups ggogle on your mbr (for example what you need to do after installing windows)
no clue what you just said. i'm trying to install grub to a jump drive to avoid installing it on the computer. (this is only going to be used temporaryly)
maybe it is better to use a grub flppy disk? (if the machine still has floppy ;))
nope no floppy (#%^#% WHY DO THEY NO LONGER PUT FLOPPY DRIVES IN???)
or boot with the livecd (it has an option called boot from hard drive)
which is pointless because it does the same thing as not haveing the cd in the drive in the first place
if yiou use ULOG target to /var/log/ulog/* if not to syslog afaik
i don't see it in syslog
then dunno I use firehol wich in turn has an option tu use ulog and thats what i use
that's a normal msg. There is no need to worry about it. The ipv6 routers is normal too
i didn't get anything about ipv6.
sorry then forget the second sentence
so it's normal to get that after the "Loading Please Wait..." message?
it's just the kernel has been freezing and the screen showing garbage when i try to boot the cd sometimes
try running « reset » on the terminal
I tried that already, and I tried it again. No effect.
